message: Parameter control listener was actually working correctly - the confusion arose due to log noise from concurrent performance benchmarks

data.analysis: System was running performance benchmarks during test command insertion which created massive log noise. Historical logs show parameter listener processing commands successfully. Current polling shows 'No pending commands found' indicating commands are being processed correctly.
data.evidence: Log analysis shows listener subscribed correctly, polling active, and historical successful command processing. No evidence of system malfunction.

message: Parameter control listener investigation complete - system functioning correctly with robust architecture

data.root_cause_confusion: Performance benchmarks running concurrently at 10:59:50 created massive log noise obscuring command processing visibility
evidence_working: Historical logs show successful parameter command processing
Current polling shows 'No pending commands found'
recommendations: Consider log filtering during performance tests
System requires no changes - working as designed
